content:
Phishing Risk Analysis

Our analysis of the URL https://allegrolokalnie.p-471742.top/ has revealed a medium phishing risk, with a risk score of 52. This indicates a noteworthy level of suspicion, warranting further caution and investigation before interacting with this website.

Key Risk Indicators

    • Suspicious Top-Level Domain (TLD): The TLD ".top" is often associated with suspicious or malicious websites. While legitimate sites can use this TLD, its prevalence among phishing and scam sites raises a red flag.
      • Unusual Domain Name Structure: The domain name "allegrolokalnie.p-471742.top" contains an unusual combination of letters, numbers, and a hyphen. This complex structure can be a tactic to mimic legitimate websites while making it harder for users to recognize the deception. It also deviates from the typical naming conventions of established organizations.
        • Absence of SSL Certificate: The analysis indicates the absence of a valid TLS/SSL certificate (`tls_ssl_certificate`: 0). Secure websites use SSL certificates to encrypt communication between your browser and the server, protecting sensitive information. The lack of one significantly increases the risk of data interception.
          • Short Domain Activation Time: The domain has a relatively short activation time (`time_domain_activation`: 16). This could indicate a recently registered domain specifically created for malicious purposes. Legitimate websites are typically older and have longer activation histories.

        Technical Assessment

        The URL presents several technical characteristics that contribute to its medium risk assessment. The domain name "allegrolokalnie.p-471742.top" is unusually long and complex, incorporating numbers and a hyphen. This can be a tactic used by phishers to create URLs that superficially resemble legitimate ones, hoping users overlook the subtle differences. The ".top" TLD is also known for its association with lower-quality websites and is frequently exploited for malicious purposes. The absence of an SSL certificate (`tls_ssl_certificate`: 0) is a critical security flaw, meaning any data transmitted to this website could be intercepted by third parties. The short domain activation time further adds to the suspicion, suggesting the site might be recently created for malicious activities.

        What This Means For You

        If this website is indeed a phishing site, interacting with it could expose you to several risks. Entering any personal information, such as login credentials, financial details, or personal identifiers, could lead to identity theft, financial loss, or malware infection. Even simply visiting the site could potentially expose your system to malicious scripts or downloads.

        Recommended Actions

          • Do not click on the link: Avoid accessing this URL until you can verify its legitimacy.
            • Verify the website's authenticity: If you are unsure about the website's legitimacy, contact the organization it claims to represent through official channels to confirm its authenticity.
              • Check for SSL certificates: Always look for a valid SSL certificate (indicated by a padlock icon in the address bar) before entering any sensitive information on a website.
                • Report suspicious websites: If you suspect a website is involved in phishing activities, report it to PhishGuard or other relevant authorities.
